definition: to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: That's because people want fancy new gadgets now.
sentences.chinese: 因为人们现在喜欢新奇的小玩意。

sentences.english: We've decorated the Christmas tree with plenty of tinsel and baubles.
sentences.chinese: 我们用很多亮亮的东西和小玩意来装饰圣诞树。

sentences.english: That's a mantelpiece cluttered up with all kinds of doodad .
sentences.chinese: 那是个摆满了各种小玩意儿的壁炉架。

sentences.english: Knowing my father, I thought it could be just about anything.
sentences.chinese: 知父莫若女，我想肯定又是什么小玩意儿。

sentences.english: He played nicknack on my sticks.
sentences.chinese: 在我的拐杖上摆弄他的小玩意儿。

sentences.english: Do you have an expensive shoe or gadget habit?
sentences.chinese: 你有买很贵的鞋子或者小玩意的习惯吗？

sentences.english: Tinker Bell's going to save us with her dopey little doohickeys .
sentences.chinese: 用小叮当的小玩意拯救大家吗？

sentences.english: Any of this stuff your husband's favorite knickknacks?
sentences.chinese: 这些是你丈夫喜欢的小玩意？

sentences.english: Who wouldn’t dig Star Wars stuff?
sentences.chinese: 谁不会到处搜罗星战的小玩意呢？

sentences.english: Wires carry the electricity to your batteries or gadgets.
sentences.chinese: 电线将把电力输送到你的电池和小玩意上。

sentences.english: He played nicknack on my knee.
sentences.chinese: 在我的膝盖上摆弄他的小玩意儿。

sentences.english: He played nicknack on my gate.
sentences.chinese: 在我的大门上摆弄他的小玩意儿。
他再一次摆弄他的小玩意儿。

sentences.english: I don’t often write love letters to gadgets.
sentences.chinese: 我不常给那些小玩意儿写求爱信。

sentences.english: it's just fun to kind of play around.
sentences.chinese: 玩弄这些小玩意儿，我觉得很有意思。

definition: erhua variant of 玩意[wan2 yi4]
needle and thread/sewing implements/needlework/(fig.) unimportant thing
toy/plaything/thing/act/trick (in a performance, stage show, acrobatics etc)
